Build: Based on Researching and Testing

Transferring the experience informed by earlier prototyping into a high fidelity app.

  • Intro
  • Site Map
  • Low Fidelity Prototype
  • High Fidelity Prototype

Based on the experience I prototyped with my friends, I converted the experience to a site map, low fidelity prototype and high fidelity prototype.

Final Statement (Job to be Done)

To discover more about myself and my inner circle, I will track our lives using moments for a week.

Site Map

The main experiences the app would need included:

  • inputting data for a moment and outputting the visualization
  • board(s) for the collected moments for individuals
  • board(s) for collective moments of circles
  • summary highlighting the major themes of a period of time (week, months, years)

Low Fidelity Prototype

  • Home page

  • Your weekly board

  • Selected moment on board

  • Your weekly board summary

  • My circles page

  • My circle's collective weekly board

  • Create a moment

  • Customize the moment

  • Your profile

  • Your monthly reports

  • Your February Report

High Fidelity Prototype

As I moved onto my high fidelity prototype, I took learnings from conducting the experience with my friends into account.

  • Allow more than one mood for each moment
  • Include short descriptions for each moment
